parameterdescription.para: array of flags. Each flag indicates if maximize or minimize the score for an objective in a specific position.

memberdef.definition: Group<T> jenes.population.Population< T extends Chromosome >.Statistics< T extends Chromosome >.addGroup
memberdef.name: addGroup

detaileddescription.para: Add a new Group of individuals definition to the population accessible in statistics

parameterdescription.para: the filter to apply in generating a Group of solutions

true if the group have to preserve the individuals that generate statistics; false if only numerical statistics are required; in this case, the Group#iterator() will return null individuals and will return ever 1. the Group generated applying the filter given as argument

memberdef.definition: double [] jenes.population.Population< T extends Chromosome >.Statistics< T extends Chromosome >.calculateStdDev
memberdef.name: calculateStdDev

detaileddescription.para: The Population.Statistics class is only responsible for storing statistics about a population. As each population can contains legal and illegal individials, it holds the individuals with the higher and lower fitness (a deep-cloning is maked to store these individuals so they don't change if the source population does), the average and deviation values both regard legal individuals and illegal ones. Esamples of use are showed below.
returns a new statistics object setted according to the specified population state.
modifies the existing statistics according to the specified population state.
